content: in the next st 9 times tfs in the row 14 skip 1st vertical bar *tps in the next st tss space before the next st tks in the next 5st tfs in in the next st* repeat across 44 the space before the next st *tss in the next st tps return in the next st* repeat to end 47 row 15 skip 1st vertical bar *tss in the next st tps return in the next st* repeat across 44 row 7 skip 1st vertical bar tss in the next st tps in return the next st tss in the next st 9 times tfs in the repeat row 14 and 15 until work measures 3cm/1 25 space before the next st tks in the next 7st tfs in inches from thumb bind off ending with a row 15 the space before the next st *tps in the next st tss slip_stitch across as for row 14 to bind off work in the next st* repeat to end 49 change to 3 5mm crochet hook return work a flat crochet slip_stitch seam into the inside row 8 skip 1st vertical bar tps in the next st tss in loops of the edges of your work to join it into a 3d the next st tps in the next st 9 times tfs in the glove space before the next st tks in the next 9st tfs in fasten_off the space before the next st *tss in the next st tps weave in ends © 2019 hayley joanne robinson
